Key Match Events: Alexander Djiku equalized for Ghana in the 56th minute
Garry Rodrigues scored the winner for Cape Verde in the 92nd minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde won 2-1 against Ghana in Africa Cup of Nations Group B
Others: Iddrisu Baba was shown the yellow card for a bad foul in the 48th minute
Deroy Duarte was shown the yellow card for a bad foul in the 64th minute
Kenny Rocha was shown the yellow card for a bad foul in the 74th minute
